```{r setup}
library(mvnimpute)
```

# Simulated data generation

We generate a 18-dimensional multivariate normal data with 8 subject to missing and 5 as interval censored, with sample size 2000. The mean vector contains 18 values as random draws from the normal distribution with mean 5 and standard deviation 1.5. The covariance matrix is genearted using the *genPositiveDefMat* function from the **clusterGeneration** package.

```{r}
# setup parameters
n <- 2000; p <- 18; miss.num <- 8; censor.num <- 5
m.vec <- rnorm(p, mean = 5, sd = 1.5)
V <- clusterGeneration::genPositiveDefMat("eigen", dim = p)

# generate the data
sim.dat <- dat.gen(n, m.vec, V$Sigma, p, miss.num, censor.num)
```
